item.title: 317 DELTA Vengeance on ancients book [NOT WORK]
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

I’ve got Vengeance on my 317 delta server on the ancients book, but when i click to cast it dosn’t do anything, i’ve got well over the correct amount of runes (999M of each, along with 999M skulls)

I’m not sure what codes i need to give to you so here is a few things.

if(playerMagicID == 18852){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - vengDelay < 30000){ sM("You can only cast vengeance spells every 30 seconds."); return; } if(playerHasItem(553, 3) && playerHasItem(560, 2) && playerHasItem(557, 3)){ if(playerLevel[6] >= 93){ vengDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); deleteItem(553, 3); deleteItem(560, 2); deleteItem(557, 3); castOnPlayer.specGFX(658); setAnimation(1914); castOnPlayer.vengon = true; castOnPlayer.sM("You have been vengeanced by "+playerName+"!"); } else sM("You need a magic level of 93 or better to cast this spell."); } else sM("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); }

Read full topic
